title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.46 - Parties; nonjoinder and misjoinder
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 263.46 - Parties; nonjoinder and misjoinder

State Regulations

No proceeding will be dismissed because of nonjoinder or
misjoinder of parties. Upon motion of any party or the board' s agent, parties
may be added, dropped, or substituted at any stage of the proceedings, upon
such terms as may be deemed proper. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
263.46

Adopted

New

York State Register February 15, 2023/Volume XLV, Issue 07, eff. 2/15/2023

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
